s0100.chinese: 禮畢，天子遂至滎陽而還。
s0100.literal: Ritual completed, Son of Heaven then arrived Xingyang and returned.
s0100.idiomatic: Ritual completed, the Son of Heaven then arrived at Xingyang and returned.

s0101.chinese: 過雒陽，下詔曰：「三代邈絕，遠矣難存。
s0101.literal: Passed Luoyang, issued edict said: 'Three dynasties distant broken, far, difficult preserve.
s0101.idiomatic: Passed Luoyang, issued edict said: 'Three dynasties distant and broken, far, difficult to preserve.
